Class ToggleSimulationPauseAction

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractAction
      ToggleSimulationPauseAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action
 class ToggleSimulationPauseAction
extends javax.swing.AbstractAction

A custom action which will toggle a simulation between paused and unpaused. This class will also handle changing the AbstractAction's name when the simulation is toggled. e.g. this will cause a JButton's text to change as appropriate.
